options.title: -c, --bytes=[+]NUM
options.description:
output the last NUM bytes; or use -c +NUM to output starting with
      byte NUM of each file

options.title: -c, --bytes=[+]NUM
options.description:
output the last NUM bytes; or use -c +NUM to output starting with
      byte NUM of each file

options.title: -f, --follow[={name|descriptor}]
options.description: output appended data as the file grows;

options.title: -f, --follow[={name|descriptor}]
options.description: output appended data as the file grows;

options.title: -F
options.description: same as --follow=name --retry

options.title: -n, --lines=[+]NUM
options.description:
output the last NUM lines, instead of the last 10; or use -n +NUM
      to output starting with line NUM

options.title: -n, --lines=[+]NUM
options.description:
output the last NUM lines, instead of the last 10; or use -n +NUM
      to output starting with line NUM

options.title: --max-unchanged-stats=N
options.description: with --follow=name, reopen a FILE which has not

options.title: --pid=PID
options.description: with -f, terminate after process ID, PID dies

options.title: -q, --quiet, --silent
options.description: never output headers giving file names

options.title: -q, --quiet, --silent
options.description: never output headers giving file names

options.title: -q, --quiet, --silent
options.description: never output headers giving file names

options.title: --retry
options.description: keep trying to open a file if it is inaccessible

options.title: -s, --sleep-interval=N
options.description:
with -f, sleep for approximately N seconds (default 1.0) between
      iterations; with inotify and --pid=P, check process P at
      least once every N seconds

options.title: -s, --sleep-interval=N
options.description:
with -f, sleep for approximately N seconds (default 1.0) between
      iterations; with inotify and --pid=P, check process P at
      least once every N seconds

options.title: -v, --verbose
options.description: always output headers giving file names

options.title: -v, --verbose
options.description: always output headers giving file names

options.title: -z, --zero-terminated
options.description: line delimiter is NUL, not newline

options.title: -z, --zero-terminated
options.description: line delimiter is NUL, not newline

options.title: --help
options.description: display this help and exit

options.title: --version
options.description: output version information and exit
